did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Letter, 1886 Feb. 17, Ariz. [to] Walter Allen, Boston, Mass.
did.abstract: Letter to Walter Allen of the Boston (Mass.) "Advertiser," regarding gift of Chiricahua doll, to Allen's daughter, and Bourke's book An Apache Campaign in the Sierra Madre.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: U.S. Army soldier, ethnologist, and author.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Letter to Walter Allen of the Boston (Mass.) "Advertiser," regarding gift of Chiricahua doll, to Allen's daughter, and Bourke's book An Apache Campaign in the Sierra Madre.
